did.unittitle: J.A. Leater et al. vs. Lawrence E Parker et al. Transcript of Record,
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Two-volume transcript of test case on "security screening" by the Coast Guard, before the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a transcript in two volumes of a test case on "security screening" by the Coast Guard, before the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: J.A. Leater et al. vs. Lawrence E. Parker et al. Transcript of Record #5362. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: J. A. Lester, Jack Eaton, John Rylander, Joseph E. Stika, J. E. Hannewyk And L. E. Carlson, Appellants, Vs. Lawrence E. Parker, Peter Mendelsohn, Fred H. Kulper, Claude Payney, Theodore W. Rolfs And Harold Fontaine, Appellees.
